channel.title: CVE Feed for vrana -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vrana -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-21311|2024-08-03T18:09:15.132Z -- vrana -- adminer
item.description: Adminer is an open-source database management in a single PHP file. In adminer from version 4.0.0 and before 4.7.9 there is a server-side request forgery vulnerability. Users of Adminer versions bundling all drivers (e.g. `adminer.php`) are affected. This is fixed in version 4.7.9.
